snippet: Bartolo Colon, 40, who in the past energized the Expos and Athletics among others, is being counted on to help replace Matt Harvey in the Mets rotation this season.
abstract: Bartolo Colon, who in the past energized other MLB teams, is being counted on to help replace Matt Harvey in the New York Mets pitching rotation this season; hope is that he can locate his fastball and mentor their young pitchers.
lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon, 40, who in the past energized the Expos and Athletics among others, is being counted on to help replace Matt Harvey in the Mets rotation this season.

headline.main: Mets Hope an Aging Ace Can Still Provide a Lift
